description: Detects the execution of certutil with the "encode" flag to encode a file to base64 where the extensions of the file is suspicious
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious File Encoded To Base64 Via Certutil.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\certutil.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"CertUtil.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\-encode*" OR "*\/encode*") AND process.command_line.text:("*.acl*" OR "*.bat*" OR "*.doc*" OR "*.gif*" OR "*.jpeg*" OR "*.jpg*" OR "*.mp3*" OR "*.pdf*" OR "*.png*" OR "*.ppt*" OR "*.tmp*" OR "*.xls*" OR "*.xml*"))
